function.name: deleteLogMessages
function.description: The function deleteLogMessages deletes all log message files that are stored in the storage.

step.originalText: If the referencing guideline limits the access to the functionality solely to authenticated users, the function SHALL check if the user that has invoked the function has the status authenticated. If the status is not authenticated, the function SHALL raise the exception ErrorUserNotAuthenticated and exit the function.
step.germanText: Prüft, ob Nutzer authentifiziert. Falls nicht: Exception ErrorUserNotAuthenticated, Ende.
step.pseudocode: WENN Benutzer NICHT authentifiziert DANN WERFE ErrorUserNotAuthenticated BEENDE_FUNKTION ENDE

step.originalText: If the referencing guideline limits the access to the functionality to certain roles, the function SHALL check in the corresponding role if the (unauthenticated) user is authorized to execute the function. If the user is not authorized, the function SHALL raise the exception ErrorUserNotAuthorized and exit the function.
step.germanText: Prüft, ob Nutzer berechtigt. Falls nicht: Exception ErrorUserNotAuthorized, Ende.
step.pseudocode: WENN Benutzer NICHT autorisiert DANN WERFE ErrorUserNotAuthorized BEENDE_FUNKTION ENDE

step.originalText: If the current time in the SE is not set, the function SHALL raise the exception ErrorTimeNotSet and exit the function.
step.germanText: Prüft, ob Zeit gesetzt. Falls nicht: Exception ErrorTimeNotSet, Ende.
step.pseudocode: WENN aktuelle Zeit im SE NICHT gesetzt DANN WERFE ErrorTimeNotSet BEENDE_FUNKTION ENDE

errorCase.trigger: Die aktuelle Zeit im SE ist nicht gesetzt

step.originalText: If the storage contains data that has not been exported, the function SHALL raise the exception ErrorUnexportedLogMessages and exit the function.
step.germanText: Prüft, ob nicht exportierte Daten vorhanden. Falls ja: Exception ErrorUnexportedLogMessages, Ende.
step.pseudocode: WENN Speicher enthält nicht exportierte Daten DANN WERFE ErrorUnexportedLogMessages BEENDE_FUNKTION ENDE

errorCase.trigger: Der Speicher enthält nicht exportierte Daten

step.originalText: The function SHALL invoke the functionality of the Secure Element to create the log message parts to log the deletion of data. If the execution fails, the function SHALL raise the exception ErrorSigningEventDataFailed and exit the function.
step.germanText: Ruft SE-Funktionalität auf, um Log-Nachricht-Teile für Datenlöschung zu erstellen. Bei Fehler: Exception ErrorSigningEventDataFailed, Ende.
step.pseudocode: VERSUCHE RUFE_AUF SE.erstelle_Log_Nachricht_Teile BEI_FEHLER WERFE ErrorSigningEventDataFailed BEENDE_FUNKTION ENDE

step.originalText: The function SHALL retrieve the parts of the log message determined by the Secure Element. If the retrieval of the log message parts fails, the function SHALL raise the exception ErrorRetrieveLogMessageFailed and exit the function.
step.germanText: Hole die Log-Nachricht-Teile vom Secure Element. Falls der Abruf fehlschlägt: Werfe ErrorRetrieveLogMessageFailed und beende Funktion.
step.pseudocode: VERSUCHE HOLE Log-Nachricht-Teile vom SE BEI_FEHLER WERFE ErrorRetrieveLogMessageFailed BEENDE_FUNKTION ENDE

errorCase.trigger: Der Abruf der Log-Nachricht-Teile schlägt fehl

step.originalText: The data of the retrieved log message parts SHALL be stored. If the data has not been stored successfully, the function SHALL raise the exception ErrorStoringLogMessageFailed and exit the function.
step.germanText: Speichert die Log-Nachricht-Teile. Bei Fehler: Exception ErrorStoringLogMessageFailed, Ende.
step.pseudocode: VERSUCHE SPEICHERE Log-Nachricht-Teile BEI_FEHLER WERFE ErrorStoringLogMessageFailed BEENDE_FUNKTION ENDE

errorCase.trigger: Die Daten wurden nicht erfolgreich gespeichert

step.originalText: The function SHALL delete all stored log messages from the storage, except of log messages that have not been exported yet. This includes the just created deleteLogMessages-log message. The function MAY keep (“not delete”) log messages that are part of un-finished (“open”) transactions, that are not considered abandoned transactions. The function SHALL ensure that only such data is deleted that has already been exported. If the deletion of the data fails, the function SHALL raise the exception ErrorDeleteLogMessagesFailed and exit the function.
step.germanText: Löscht alle exportierten Log-Nachrichten (außer offene Transaktionen). Bei Fehler: Exception ErrorDeleteLogMessagesFailed, Ende.
step.pseudocode: VERSUCHE LÖSCHE alle exportierten Log-Nachrichten BEI_FEHLER WERFE ErrorDeleteLogMessagesFailed BEENDE_FUNKTION ENDE

errorCase.trigger: Das Löschen der Daten schlägt fehl

step.originalText: If all log messages, with exception of the just stored deleteLogMessages-log message and remaining transaction log messages of open transactions, have been deleted, the function SHALL return without raising an exception to indicate that the execution of the function has been successful.
step.germanText: Gibt ohne Exception zurück, wenn alle Log-Nachrichten gelöscht wurden.

returnValue.description: This function does not return a value.

asn1Structure.logMessage: LogMessage ::= SEQUENCE { version INTEGER (3), certifiedDataType OBJECT IDENTIFIER (id-SE-API-system-log), certifiedData SystemLogMessage, -- embedded system log serialNumber OCTET STRING (SIZE (32)), signatureAlgorithm AlgorithmIdentifier, seAuditData OCTET STRING OPTIONAL, signatureCounter INTEGER, signatureCreationTime Time, signatureValue OCTET STRING }
asn1Structure.systemLogMessage:
SystemLogMessage ::= SEQUENCE { version INTEGER (3), certifiedDataType OBJECT IDENTIFIER (id-SE-API-system-log), eventType [0] IMPLICIT PrintableString ("deleteLogMessages"), eventOrigin [1] IMPLICIT PrintableString OPTIONAL, eventTriggeredByUser [2] IMPLICIT UserId OPTIONAL, eventData [3] IMPLICIT DeleteLogMessagesEventData, additionalInternalData [4] IMPLICIT OCTET STRING OPTIONAL, serialNumber OCTET STRING (SIZE (32)), signatureAlgorithm AlgorithmIdentifier, signatureCounter INTEGER, signatureCreationTime Time, signatureValue OCTET STRING }
DeleteLogMessagesEventData ::= SEQUENCE { -- left empty intentionally }

field.name: version
field.description: Version of the log message format. SHALL be set to '3'.

field.name: certifiedDataType
field.description: MUST be set to the OID id-SE-API-system-log.

field.name: eventOrigin
field.description: Component that triggered the event (e.g., component name).

field.name: eventTriggeredByUser
field.description: User ID of the user that triggered the event.

field.name: additionalInternalData
field.description: MUST NOT be present. Reserved for future use.

field.name: serialNumber
field.description: Serial number of the Secure Element consisting of the hash value of the public key of the certificate used to verify system logs.

field.name: signatureCounter
field.description: Current count of signatures created with the log message signing key protected by the Secure Element.

field.name: signatureCreationTime
field.description: Point in time of the Secure Element when the log message was signed.

field.name: signatureValue
field.description: Result of the signature computation encoded as octet string.
